## TIsGl2 type

`true` if `TCtx` extends `WebGL2RenderingContext`<!-- -->, `false` otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TIsGl2<TCtx extends TGlContext> = TCtx extends WebGL2RenderingContext ? true : false;
```
<b>References:</b> [TGlContext](./core.tglcontext.md)
